function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Adopt standardized data quality control measures and sharing protocols","category":"Promote verified information"},{"name":"Implementing ethical guidelines and enhancing cybersecurity measures","category":"Facilitate transparent communication"},{"name":"Improving model specificity and increasing data diversity","category":"Data quality improvement and diversification"},{"name":"Advocate for regulatory changes and development of privacy-preserving contact tracing technologies","category":"Facilitate transparent communication"},{"name":"Develop and enforce ethical guidelines, conduct privacy impact assessments","category":"Facilitate transparent communication"},{"name":"Implement strict protocols for contact tracing, ensure privacy protection, and provide adequate training for contact tracing personnel.","category":"Quarantine support"},{"name":"Use geolocation technologies, community outreach programs, and alternative identification methods for contact-persons.","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent contamination"},{"name":"Provide personal protective equipment ppe , mental health support, and stigma reduction training for contact tracing personnel.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment"},{"name":"Strict regulations on data access and usage, transparent protocols for data handling","category":"Facilitate transparent communication"},{"name":"Promote a balanced approach to public health, educate on the limitations of technology","category":"Raising diversification"},{"name":"Invest in rapid and scalable testing technologies, increase production and distribution of test kits, and implement alternative testing methods","category":"Absorb surge in service demande"},{"name":"Improve data quality through standardization, eliminate noise in data, and utilize alternative data sources for training ai models","category":"Data quality improvement and diversification"},{"name":"Expand the search criteria to include broader terms related to public health and infectious diseases, and incorporate input from multidisciplinary experts.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring"},{"name":"Utilize translation technologies and collaborate with international research networks to access non-english literature. consider the inclusion of preprint articles and non-peer-reviewed studies with rigorous review processes.","category":"Promote verified information"},{"name":"Combine ai-assisted screening with manual review by
